name: eVibs
tag_list: nigeria, nigerian, nigeria-talents, nigerian-entrepreneurs, entrepreneurs, vibs, nigeria-fashion, nigeria-music, nigeria-gossips, news, nigeria-technology, nigeria-technologist
overview:
EVIBS is an exponent of the EDigests Enterprises, a company registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission of Nigeria, with registration number BN 2161305. Her aim is to exhibit the great talents of the many anonymous Nigerians at home and Diaspora, bringing them to limelight.

Our initial plan was to discuss only Entrepreneurial ideas but the whole concept later transformed into a reverie of exposing not just Nigerian Entrepreneurs but all Nigerian talents we can lay our hands on to gain exposure, credibility and fame both locally and internationally.

EVIBS is concerned with exposing all ANONYMOUS and bringing them to SPOTLIGHT, thus our concept Slogan, â€œFrom Anonymous To Spotlight.â€œ
